MIME element (text/plain)
Hello,
  I have an important request for you; I unsuccessfully tried to contact
the webmaster or the person responsible for the website thumblogger.com.

  I would like to ask him to quickly remove some personal information
that he illegally published and that violate my privacy. 
    
  Please inform the webmaster to change in his websites the name "Alice
Troise" with the name "Anita Princesa" at the following addresses: 
   
 
http://hegreart.thumblogger.com/home/log/2006/42/coming-soon--the-offici
al.html
  and 
   
 
http://fineartnude.thumblogger.com/home/log/2006/44/coming-soon---the-of
ficial.html
  and
  http://fineartnude.thumblogger.com/home/list/2006/44/. 
  The article where my name appears is related to Villa Mangiacane
Collection and Petter Hegre; you can see that my data had been already
changed in the same article on the official website of Petter Hegre: 
  http://www.hegre-art.com/news/Villa_Mangiacane_2007_collection_37.html

    
  Many thanks! 
  Alice Troise
